Text.Page:
Linkia's research mentioned this argon queenâ€”Shandra Manaya. Obviously, she'd be a damned good target to hit.

To that end, I'm sending you to help {@LinkCreature:250#1003}. If we can get a line on the queen's location, we're going to kill her. Or die trying.

I'm not making any promises, but security around here is pretty tough. Queen or no queen, the argons don't want anyone crashing this party.

If you can kill Dulixan and his floaty prismar watchers, I'll study the entrance for Medhvan.

Outstanding! Gah! My blood boils at the thought of getting my claws around that wretch's throat!

I'll get this information to Kaiator at once. Fine work, soldier!
